price: Pregúntales [¡oh, Mujámmad!]: "Si saben, ¿a quién pertenece la Tierra y todo lo que existe sobre ella?"
arabic: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qul limani al-arḍu waman fīhā in kuntum taʿlamūna
